lexUnit.name: sprawled.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: with one's limbs spread out in an ungainly way

sentence.text: The frozen image of a naked girl , sprawled on a bed , backing away , her face distorted with fear .
Hari no longer paced nervously up and down ; he lay sprawled on a pile of dirty straw , his eyes extinct .
He glanced down at Gomez , still sprawled on the cockpit sole .
Not long afterwards the red bitch was sprawled on her side , asleep , with all six puppies climbing on top of each other , scrabbling for access to her swollen teats .
` Given the Russian setting , " said Rozanov , sprawled on a bed , his eyes closed , ` I do n't accept that it 's an impossibility .
Halfway there he found Lio!rt sprawled on the ground , one leg bent awkwardly .
A naked Goodenache was sprawled across the bed .
Ma is clearing lunch , and the Monster ( who had proved as immune to holy caravan water as predicted ) , is sprawled on the rug stinking the place out as always .
Anyone could be sprawled there .
Michael Bridges was still sprawled in his chair , but his face was alert .
Left alone in the waiting room , Rose and Auguste contemplated the corpse sprawled over the desk , noting that it faced the window with its back to the door .
He was sprawled in an armchair opposite and the expression on his face clearly told her that he knew exactly what she and Jennifer had been discussing .
The body lay sprawled , its face covered by a dirty rag .
The two soldiers were sprawled there half-asleep .
Fabio , sprawled in an armchair , glanced at her sullenly .
He was lying sprawled across the pillow leaning on his elbow , his head propped to one side , reading the letter .
Under the portico , bodies are sprawled , a tangle of limbs of malnourished young men .
Part way down the corridor , one grey clad figure was sprawled motionless on the floor , while a second was painfully belly-crawling back towards the far end .
Some would look with pity at a fool , sprawled across a bench , bottle in hand , others would curse , telling him he was a bad smell which would n't go away .
And there was Iris Sunderby 's recumbent body sprawled in the back .
And Boris was sprawled insensible over the small working table .
To her astonishment the intruder kicked the door shut behind him with a thrust of one foot , then proceeded to saunter over to where she was still sprawled in amazement across the bed .
The observer lay sprawled across his gun , his blond hair streaming romantically in the wind .
The next thing she knew , she was lying sprawled across the pavement .
When Annie got home , Mike was sprawled over the couch watching telly .
I see myself sprawled in a chair , setting them at ease in a trice , and passing on the acquired wisdom of my life .
She was sprawled , hugging a sausage-shaped pillow like Linus ' comforter .
He was sprawled in his chair , his long legs outstretched , his hand holding the plate of sandwiches away from his body .
